biocontainers.name: bgreat
biocontainers.summary: BGREAT2 is a read mapping tool for NGS sequencing data that align reads on a de Bruijn graph. Preliminary version described at https://bmcbioinformatics.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12859-016-1103-9 and used in Bcool a short read corrector (https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.03336)
